memberdef.name: he_test_modes
memberdef.initializer: = { {"fpgardcachehit", HE_FPGA_RD_CACHE_HIT}, {"fpgawrcachehit", HE_FPGA_WR_CACHE_HIT}, {"fpgardcachemiss", HE_FPGA_RD_CACHE_MISS}, {"fpgawrcachemiss", HE_FPGA_WR_CACHE_MISS}, {"hostrdcachehit", HE_HOST_RD_CACHE_HIT}, {"hostwrcachehit", HE_HOST_WR_CACHE_HIT}, {"hostrdcachemiss", HE_HOST_RD_CACHE_MISS}, {"hostwrcachemiss", HE_HOST_WR_CACHE_MISS}, }

memberdef.name: he_req_atomic_func
memberdef.initializer: = { { "off", HOSTEXE_ATOMIC_OFF}, { "fadd_4", HOSTEXE_ATOMIC_FADD_4}, { "fadd_8", HOSTEXE_ATOMIC_FADD_8}, { "swap_4", HOSTEXE_ATOMIC_SWAP_4}, { "swap_8", HOSTEXE_ATOMIC_SWAP_8}, { "cas_4", HOSTEXE_ATOMIC_CAS_4}, { "cas_8", HOSTEXE_ATOMIC_CAS_8}, }

memberdef.name: interleave_help
memberdef.initializer: = R"desc(Interleave requests pattern to use in throughput mode {0, 1, 2} indicating one of the following series of read/write requests: 0: rd-wr-rd-wr 1: rd-rd-wr-wr 2: rd-rd-rd-rd-wr-wr-wr-wr)desc"
